about_the_game:
Infinite Onslaught is a high-octane, retro modern shooter that pays homage to the action-packed arcade games of the 1990s. Set in a vividly detailed, pixel-art world, and equipped with a range of devastating weapons, including futuristic guns and explosive gadgets, players battle through waves of enemies and towering bosses.

The game is based on patent-pending Keyboard Basher technology, which gives you that light-gun feel without the need to purchase any specialized controllers.

In this intense journey, our hero, Matt Johntrix is betrayed during a covert operation during which his team is exterminated. He must fight his way out of a high-tech facility using experimental weapons. As he tracks down those responsible, he faces off against cybernetically enhanced foes, including cyborgs, drones, and robotic beasts. The game features a thrilling narrative with escalating stakes, culminating in an epic showdown against the mastermind behind the chaos.

Features

  • Platforms: Steam (PC/Mac)

  • Genre: Keyboard Basher, Modern Retro Shooter

  • Key Features:

    • Retro graphics and catchy soundtrack

    • Keyboard-based light-gun shooting

    • Fast-paced on-rails action

    • Vengeance-driven narrative

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 11 Big Sur or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 13 Ventura or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard

name: Infinite Onslaught

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard or Touchscreen
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard

reviews:
“Remember the satisfying click of a plastic light gun and the hypnotic glow of arcade screens? Bonkers Builders has found a brilliant way to bring it all rushing back without the need for specialized hardware. The solution? A keyboard.”
Game Rant

“Infinite Onslaught is a perfect indie escape which breaks this mold, and by doing so, brings back the adrenaline-fueled fun of retro light-gun games such as Operation Wolf, but with a twist of its own.”
Bounding Into Comics
short_description: Infinite Onslaught is a fast-paced, on-rails arcade shooter that immerses players in a relentless battle against overwhelming odds, delivering non-stop action from start to finish. Pixel art, retro, cartoonish military style. It uses Keyboard Basher technology to provide light-gun-style gameplay.
